item.title: Image Optimizer
item.description: Platform Name URL macOS ImageOptim https://imageoptim.com Windows pinga https://css-ig.net/pinga Windows pingo https://css-ig.net/pingo Linux advdef https://www.advancemame.it/doc-advdef Linux advpng http://www.advancemame.it/doc-advpng.html Linux ect https://github.com/fhanau/Efficient-Compression-Tool Linux optipng http://optipng.sourceforge.net Linux oxipng https://github.com/shssoichiro/oxipng Linux pngoptimizer https://psydk.org/pngoptimizer Linux pngout http://advsys.net/ken/util/pngout.htm Linux pngwolf https://github.com/hoehrmann/pngwolf Linux zopflipng https://github.com/google/zopfli

item.title: Why need Cookie Management Team
item.description: Motivation We need a team management avoid Cookie Hell and GDPR Compliance problem. * Cookie Hell is Cookie request field over 4 KiB. Cookie Review Workflow submit to cookie management team justification life-cycle start-time to end-time submit to legal (if can) wait for approval References https://gdpr.eu/cookies/ https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/cookie-consent-management-template-offered-help-buy-lawrence-shaw/ Thanks Special thanks to https://github.

item.title: Archlinux ARM Prebuilt image
